name: Word Cheat for Board Games
description:
◆ 2 letter words
◆ 3 letter words
◆ All vowels
◆ High scoring words
◆ Prefix & Suffix
◆ Tile distribution of Game

Other Features
◆ FAST! Searches
◆ Fully Offline Mode App
◆ Universal App — designed for iPhone and iPad

This app content very light advertisement.

In App Purchase for No-Ads, Search & Bookmark Upto 15 Letter




The creators of this app are in no way affiliated with the authors of Scrabble, Words With Friends, Wordfeud, Aworded (Angry Word), Word Domination, Lexulous, Alphajax, Literati, Word By Post, Wordchums, Wordscraper & Wordsmith or any other app, game, licensor or trademark mentioned in this description or in the app

Goodluck!
